title: How to Install the Ika typescript SDK
description: Continue reading on Medium ¬ª
content: How to Install the Ika typescript SDKHen√∏ch1 min read¬∑Just now--ListenSharePress enter or click to view image in full sizePrerequisite: Install Sui on your local system‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe command-line interface for interacting with the Sui blockchain.1)To use the Ika TypeScript SDK from the repository, you have to clone the repository and install the dependencies:git clone https://github.com/dwallet-labs/ika.gitAdd this to your package.json file.{  "dependencies": {    "@ika.xyz/sdk": "file:../sdk/typescript/dist"  }}2) Create the app and package.jsonOpen Command prompt in your app folder (e.g. C:\Users\HP\Documents\Programming Folder\Ika-protocol-playground) and run:# go to your app foldercd "C:\Users\HP\Documents\Programming Folder\Ika-protocol-playground"# create package.json quickly (use npm on Windows to avoid pnpm init oddities)npm init -yThis creates a basic package.json. üëç3) Link the local SDKFrom the same app folder run:# link local SDK from your cloned repo (adjust path if your clone is elsewhere)pnpm add link:../ika/sdk/typescriptExpected output¬†: + @ika.xyz/sdk 1.0.0 <-¬†..\ika\sdk\typescriptThat makes @ika.xyz/sdk available inside your app‚Äôs node_modules as a linked local package.

title: The Great AI Bubble of 2025 Is About to Burst
description:
Insane costs, zero profits, and even Sam Altman is sounding the alarm. The AI gold rush is a lie, and the whole thing is about to get ugly

Continue reading on Medium ¬ª
content: Member-only storyThe Great AI Bubble of 2025 Is About to BurstInsane costs, zero profits, and even Sam Altman is sounding the alarm. The AI gold rush is a lie, and the whole thing is about to get uglyRohit Kumar Thakur5 min read¬∑Just now--SharePress enter or click to view image in full sizeLet‚Äôs be real for a second. AI has been everywhere these past few years. Every day, there‚Äôs a new model, a new breakthrough, a new promise that we‚Äôre just one step away from AGI.We‚Äôve all felt it, right? That sense of excitement, the feeling that we‚Äôre standing right at the edge of a technological revolution. I‚Äôve written about it myself.But I‚Äôve been digging into something lately.. something that feels.. off. Honestly, it worries me. We‚Äôve already seen this story play out before with Web3, the metaverse, and NFTs. And to me, it sounds a lot like another bubble about to burst.In this article, I‚Äôm going to connect the dots for you, using real data and some shocking warnings from the very people at the top. I‚Äôm not hyping this. Just a cold, hard reality check.First, What the Hell Just Happened?A few days ago, the tech world got a nasty surprise. A massive, sudden sell-off hit AI stocks. We‚Äôre talking big names, the darlings of Silicon Valley, suddenly bleeding value.
author: Written by Rohit Kumar Thakur

title: ChatGPT 5 Under Attack: Can Hackers Downgrade AI Security?
description:
ChatGPT 5 Under Attack: Can Hackers Downgrade AI Security?

Continue reading on Medium ¬ª
content: Member-only storyChatGPT 5 Under Attack: Can Hackers Downgrade AI Security?Liran Nachman3 min read¬∑Just now--SharePress enter or click to view image in full sizeA newly discovered ‚Äúdowngrade attack‚Äù allows hackers to bypass ChatGPT 5‚Äôs security with simple prompts. This exploit highlights the ongoing challenges in ensuring AI safety and preventing malicious use.ChatGPT 5 Under Attack: Can Hackers Downgrade AI Security?The world of AI is constantly evolving, and with each leap forward comes new challenges and potential vulnerabilities. The latest buzz surrounds a reported ‚Äúdowngrade attack‚Äù on ChatGPT 5. But what does this mean, and how worried should we be?Understanding the Downgrade AttackIn cybersecurity, a ‚Äúdowngrade attack‚Äù typically involves forcing a system to use an older, less secure protocol or version. Think of it like convincing a sophisticated security system to revert to an older, simpler model that‚Äôs easier to trick. In the context of AI, this could mean manipulating the AI with specific prompts to make it behave like an earlier version, potentially bypassing newer security measures and ethical guidelines.Imagine this: ChatGPT 5 has been trained to avoid generating harmful content. A clever hacker might find a way to phrase prompts that trick the AI into ‚Äúthinking‚Äù it‚Äôs an older version, one that hasn‚Äôt been fully trained on these safety protocols. Suddenly, the AI might start generating content it shouldn‚Äôt, revealing sensitive information, or even assisting in malicious activities. Spooky, right?Why is This Significant?
author: Written by Liran Nachman

title: Future-Secure Careers: High-Demand Jobs You Should Start Learning Now
description:
Let’s face it — the job market is evolving faster than ever. With AI, automation, and digital transformation sweeping every industry, many…

Continue reading on Medium ¬ª
content: Future-Secure Careers: High-Demand Jobs You Should Start Learning NowShahzaib Shah3 min read¬∑Just now--ListenShareLet‚Äôs face it ‚Äî the job market is evolving faster than ever. With AI, automation, and digital transformation sweeping every industry, many traditional jobs are fading while new, exciting roles are emerging.The good news? If you start learning the right skills now, you can future-proof your career and tap into high-paying opportunities in the next 5‚Äì10 years.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeHere‚Äôs a breakdown of future in-demand jobs, what they involve, how much they pay, and how to get started.1. üß† AI & Machine Learning EngineerWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Artificial Intelligence is reshaping industries from healthcare to finance. Companies need engineers who can build smart systems that learn and improve over time.Average Salary:üí∞ $120,000+ (can go much higher with experience)How to Start Learning:Languages: Python, RTools: TensorFlow, PyTorchCourses: Google AI, Coursera‚Äôs ML by Andrew NgTip: Start with small ML projects like spam detectors or image classifiers.2. üíª Cybersecurity SpecialistWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Cybercrime is rising, and companies need experts to protect sensitive data. Cybersecurity isn‚Äôt just about hacking ‚Äî it‚Äôs about prevention, detection, and defense.Average Salary:üí∞ $100,000+How to Start Learning:Certifications: CompTIA Security+, CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker)Skills: Network security, cryptography, threat analysisTry: Practice on TryHackMe or Hack The Box3. üåê Data Analyst / Data ScientistWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Data is the new oil. Companies need people who can analyze massive amounts of data and turn it into smart decisions.Average Salary:üí∞ $70,000‚Äì$130,000+How to Start Learning:Languages: SQL, PythonTools: Excel, Tableau, Power BICourses: IBM Data Science (Coursera), DataCamp4. üì± App & Web DeveloperWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Almost every business needs a digital presence. Whether it‚Äôs a mobile app or a custom website, developers will continue to be in high demand.Average Salary:üí∞ $80,000‚Äì$120,000+How to Start Learning:Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactBackend: Node.js, Django, FirebaseResources: freeCodeCamp, Codecademy, YouTube tutorials5. üé® UI/UX DesignerWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:User experience is everything. Companies want apps and websites that are not just functional, but enjoyable to use.Average Salary:üí∞ $70,000‚Äì$110,000+How to Start Learning:Tools: Figma, Adobe XD, SketchSkills: Design thinking, user research, prototypingCourses: Google UX Design (Coursera), Interaction Design Foundation6. üåø Sustainability SpecialistWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Climate change is real, and companies are under pressure to go green. Sustainability consultants help businesses reduce their environmental impact.Average Salary:üí∞ $60,000‚Äì$100,000+How to Start Learning:Fields: Environmental science, energy management, green buildingCertifications: LEED, ESG trainingBonus: Great for people who want to make a difference7. üß≥ Digital Content Creator / MarketerWhy It‚Äôs in Demand:Content is king. Whether it‚Äôs YouTube, Instagram, or blogs ‚Äî brands need creative people who can grab attention and drive engagement.Average Income:üí∞ Ranges widely ‚Äî from $50,000 to six figures (if you build your own brand)How to Start Learning:Skills: SEO, copywriting, social media, video editingTools: Canva, Premiere Pro, BufferStart Today: Build your own brand or freelance on Fiverr/UpworkFinal ThoughtsThe future of work is digital, data-driven, and dynamic. Whether you‚Äôre a student, career-switcher, or just looking to upskill ‚Äî there‚Äôs never been a better time to invest in learning.üöÄ Pick a path, stay consistent, and start small. In 2‚Äì3 years, your future self will thank you ‚Äî both in experience and income.üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Over to YouWhich of these careers are you most interested in? Or are you already learning something from the list? Drop your thoughts in the comments (if you‚Äôre posting this on Medium) or feel free to share your journey!
author: Written by Shahzaib Shah
